title: School Start Time Survey: A Mosaic Plot
question_text:
Parents of students at Morningtown High School have raised concerns that the school start time is too early. To investigate opinions on the matter, the Board of Education surveyed students and staff at the high school and asked the question: "Would you be in favor of a later starting time for the high school?" Results are shown in the mosaic plot below.
Which of the following statements cannot be justified from the mosaic plot?

choices.text: More students responded to the survey than did staff.
At least twice as many students said "Yes" than said "No".
Roughly the same number of staff said "Yes" as said "No".
More staff members said "No" than did students.
A greater percentage of students said "Yes" than did staff.
